pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, March 16, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local 

Greater Toronto Area, Ontario

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will convene the NAFTA Advisory Council meeting. He will be joined by the Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance, Chrystia Freeland, and the Minister of International Trade, Export Promotion, Small Business and Economic Development, Mary Ng.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall with firefighters hosted by the International Association of Fire Fighters (IAFF).

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:15 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
